title: Swordsman - PJ Ladd
description:
“Swordsman - PJ Ladd “ is the first of a series with some of my favorite skaters.  A slowed down, more documentary look at skateboarding and some of the best to do it. 
This first episode was shot in October 2020 when the world was at a standstill. I met PJ Ladd in his stomping grounds of Boston mass just before it got too cold to skate.  

All shot on the Lumix GH5 and GH5S

title: Girl - Yeah Right!
description: Yeah Right, the 2003 skateboarding video from Girl Skateboards, is largely considered one of the most influential skate films of all time. Directed by Ty Evans and Spike Jonze, Yeah Right! is notable for its soundtrack, length, and the extensive use of special effects. The intro is one of the first films to capture skateboarding in ultra-slow motion. Yeah Right also features the celebrated 'Invisible Board' skit.

title: Coliseum - P.J. Ladd's Wonderful, Horrible, Life
description: One of the most beloved and influential skate videos of all time. A VHS release of the video (black and blue tapes) was produced followed by a DVD release which included re-edited parts, bonus clips, additional skaters, and different music for certain parts.

title: What Youth x Monster - The Copenhagen Project
description:
Directed by Kai Neville
It’s only been within the last few years that we’ve noticed enough crossover in surfing and skating that the idea of a collaboration like this was real. And we’re not talking about maneuvers, grabs or any of that political mess. We just noticed ourselves admiring the ethos and mentalities that skateboarding cherishes. They reminded us of a better time in surfing. A less selfish time in surfing.
Thanks to Monster Energy and the amazing Simon Weyhe, Camilla Jane Lea and William Frederiksen (founders of the CPH PRO for inviting and giving us the opportunity to attend The Copenhagen Pro, a truly unique cultural skateboard experience in the beautiful city of Copenhagen, Denmark. We made this film about it.
Starring Ishod Wair, Shane O'Neill, Peter Ramondetta, Arto Saari and many more.

title: End of the World
description: "End of the World" Follows Mike Mag on his journey through heartbreak and to the end of the world during which Mike Mag travelled from LA all the way down to Punta Arenas in Chile (so essentially the Southernmost major town in South America) via Florida and Rio de Janeiro. Imagine making it to what must have felt like the end of the world just as that said world was being engulfed in global pandemic panic…

title: Nike SB - Nyjah Huston "Need That"
description: Nyjah sends it like few other can, attacking the streets with determination that can be summed up in two words: Need That.

title: DUSK
description: "In a time when full lengths are becoming less and less frequent, Mason Tabet does his part to preserve the craft by presenting DUSK. Featuring talent from Albuquerque and across New Mexico, this video will make you want to hit the streets and helps remind us all why full length videos are so important." -Skate Jawn
